item.title: Report X-2024090232
item.description:
Report X-2024090232

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-06T09:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-23
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED IN A PILE OF BATH BODY WORKS LEAKING ONTO IT. PACKAGE WAS REMOVED FOR PROCESSING AND WHEN OPENED IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE INNER BOXES WERE UNDECLARED NON-FLAMMABLE GAS HAZMAT PRODUCTS, ARTICLES, PRESSURIZED HYDRAULIC. NO HAZMAT MARKINGS WERE ON THE OUTER CARTON.

item.title: Report X-2024090209
item.description:
Report X-2024090209

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-21
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PACKAGE AND UPON FURTHER INSPECTION WAS FOUND TO CONTAIN 3 PALM HANDHELDS WITH LITIUM ION BATTERIES. REWRAP; PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON; NO DAMAGE TO PALM TX HANDHELDS.

item.title: Report X-2024090124
item.description:
Report X-2024090124

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-05T09:13:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-14
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DAMAGE INSPECTION; LEAKER. RESPONDER RESPONDED TO CALL FOR LEAKING PACKAGE IN UNLOAD. UPON INSPECTING PACKAGE, DISCOVERED IT CONTAIN MULTIPLE DENTED AEROSOL CANS, MANY HAVING LOST THEIR PROTECTIVE COVERS. BOX HAD NO HAZMAT WARNING LABELS.
